revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Atheros |model=AR5BAP-00031 |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=07/21/2003 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=reference design |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PPD-AR5BAP-00031 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR5312A |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=5up |oui=00:03:7F |oui_eth=00:03:7F }} This is the AP31 reference design.
Login credentials and the used OUI (00:03:7F, ''[[Atheros]]'') are from the FCC provided manual.
===Probable used PSU(s)=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''FSP Group''' FSP013-1AD201.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=FSP Group |model=FSP013-1AD201 |manuf_country=China |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=C5 |output_v=5 |output_a=2.5 |output_conn=barrel |style=modular, brick |e_level=5 }}
